mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cast(SUBSTRING(member_no,8) as decimal)), 0) FROM member
SELECT member_name ,member_gender ,member_address ,member_email ,member_birth ,member_tel FROM member WHERE member_id=#{id}

SELECT m.member_name AS memberName ,m.member_gender AS memberGender ,m.member_address AS memberAddress ,m.member_email AS memberEmail ,m.member_birth AS memberBirth ,m.member_tel AS memberTel ,d.member_register_no AS doctorRegisterNo ,d.member_hospital_name AS hospitalName ,d.treatment_department AS treatmentDepartment FROM member m,member_doctor d WHERE m.member_no=d.member_no AND m.member_id=#{id}

SELECT m.member_name AS memberName ,m.member_gender AS memberGender ,m.member_address AS memberAddress ,m.member_email AS memberEmail ,m.member_birth AS memberBirth ,m.member_tel AS memberTel ,t.member_register_no AS teacherRegisterNo ,t.member_work_space AS memberWorkSpace FROM member m,member_teacher t WHERE m.member_no=t.member_no AND m.member_id=#{id}
SELECT member_evidence_file_ext AS memberFileExt ,member_evidence_file_name AS memberFileName FROM member_file WHERE member_no=#{memberNo}

SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_birth ,m.member_level FROM member m,member_teacher t WHERE m.member_no=t.member_no And m.member_level >=3 And t.member_join_approval='F' UNION SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_birth ,m.member_level FROM member m,member_doctor d WHERE m.member_no=d.member_no And m.member_level >=3 And d.member_join_approval='F' LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT SUM(total) FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM member m,member_doctor d WHERE m.member_no=d.member_no And m.member_level >=3 And d.member_join_approval='F' UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM member m,member_teacher t WHERE m.member_no=t.member_no And m.member_level >=3 And t.member_join_approval='F' )tb

SELECT d.member_register_no ,d.member_hospital_name ,d.treatment_department ,f.member_evidence_file_ext ,f.member_evidence_file_name ,f.member_evidence_file_real_name FROM member_doctor d,member_file f WHERE d.member_no=f.member_no AND d.member_no =#{memberNo}

SELECT t.member_register_no ,t.member_work_space ,f.member_evidence_file_ext ,f.member_evidence_file_name ,f.member_evidence_file_real_name FROM member_teacher t,member_file f WHERE t.member_no=f.member_no AND t.member_no =#{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member_doctor SET member_join_approval='T' WHERE member_no=#{memberNo}
UPDATE member_teacher SET member_join_approval='T' WHERE member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_name=#{memberName} AND member_email=#{memberEmail}
SELECT member_pw FROM member WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND member_email=#{memberEmail}

SELECT member_no ,member_id ,member_pw ,member_level ,member_name ,member_gender ,member_address ,member_email ,member_birth ,member_tel ,member_agree ,member_join_date FROM member WHERE member_level=2 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_pw ,m.member_level ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_address ,m.member_email ,m.member_birth ,m.member_tel ,m.member_agree ,m.member_join_date ,d.member_register_no ,d.member_hospital_name ,d.treatment_department FROM member m,member_doctor d WHERE m.member_no=d.member_no AND m.member_level=3 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_pw ,m.member_level ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_address ,m.member_email ,m.member_birth ,m.member_tel ,m.member_agree ,m.member_join_date ,t.member_register_no ,t.member_work_space FROM member m,member_teacher t WHERE m.member_no=t.member_no AND m.member_level=4 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT member_no ,member_id ,member_pw ,member_level ,member_name ,member_gender ,member_address ,member_email ,member_birth ,member_tel ,member_agree ,member_join_date FROM member WHERE ${searchSelect} LIKE '%${searchText}%' AND member_level=2 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_pw ,m.member_level ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_address ,m.member_email ,m.member_birth ,m.member_tel ,m.member_agree ,m.member_join_date ,d.member_register_no ,d.member_hospital_name ,d.treatment_department FROM member m,member_doctor d WHERE m.member_no=d.member_no AND ${searchSelect} LIKE '%${searchText}%' AND m.member_level=3 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT m.member_no ,m.member_id ,m.member_pw ,m.member_level ,m.member_name ,m.member_gender ,m.member_address ,m.member_email ,m.member_birth ,m.member_tel ,m.member_agree ,m.member_join_date ,t.member_register_no ,t.member_work_space FROM member m,member_teacher t WHERE m.member_no=t.member_no AND ${searchSelect} LIKE '%${searchText}%' AND m.member_level=4 LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
